about_the_game:
Marianna is a sea witch capable of powerful magic and mystical alchemy, which she only uses to help people. When Princess Cassandra visits her with a request to find out why her fiancé was acting so strange and why he left, Marianna takes the case, only to discover that she might have more of a connection to the culprit than she realized! Join Marianna on a dangerous journey to untangle the tale of the siren’s song and discover who is really behind this mind-bending mystery in this magical Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. As a bonus, Collector's Edition purchases count toward three stamps on your Monthly Game Club Punch Card!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

• Capture mischievous creatures to save a wedding in the bonus game!
• Follow the clues with the strategy guide!
• Collect special cards and shells to unlock puzzle pieces in the secret room!
• Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, screensavers, music, and more!
